content: any fellow crackers Wow the table top crafters guild Facebook page is growing
and growing lots of great inspiration on there you know a huge influx of new
members and it's really a great space to get inspiration but I do kind of Miss
that a little more personal space that as you just grow you tend to grow out of
that right you just can't it's harder and harder to keep that out so what I
think I want to do is you know people have asked me about doing another
Facebook page what I think I'm going to do is I'm going to create another group
that will be tied to my patreon so if you become a member of my patreon all
you're already a member of my patreon you can automatically join the group and
it'll be a more intimate group you can ask me more personal questions than that
kind of thing and the only thing I asked is just just treat the you know treat
the members in this group like you would treat yourself gonna be a much smaller
group I'm really gonna be the only admin or anything so you know I all I ask is
that you just treat people like they were face to face right when you
interact with them another the only other rules I really want to have are
that no religious posts or no political posts that just keeps you know that kind
of thing out of our spit our great fun space you know that we have we're gonna
reserve for our crafting and yeah so I just want to tell you guys this news I'm
gonna be creating this page very soon and those of my patreon group will
automatically be in the group and if anybody else wants to join just you can
just run on patreon and get automatically so it'll be one of my
it'll be my lowest tier reward so anybody as long as you do $1 a month you
can even join the group so thanks you guys take care happy crafting
go forth and crap and happy gaming
